title: Growing Carrots
author: Danny Alan
detail:
So, the whole country is currently on lockdown due to the global Coronavirus outbreak and trying to get supplies is getting ever increasingly difficult.

Cobe and Jac have decided to take matters into their own hands today with the help of M&S. They're planting carrots for the garden so we can have fresh carrots should we need them!

Cobe has done all the plating himself so we're rather proud :)
